ruleset.name: Apex Method Signature Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex method signatures and parameters

rule.name: NoCustomParameterObjects
rule.message: Never create custom classes, inner classes, or wrapper objects solely for passing parameters
rule.description: Custom parameter objects should not be created. Refactor methods to stay within 3 parameters instead.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //UserClass[ count(Method) = 0 and count(Field) > 0 and count(Field) < 10 and @Nested = true() and not(Field/ModifierNode/Annotation[@Name = 'InvocableVariable']) ]
